name: All-Knowing Greaves
How to Acquire:
The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, a alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Alberich's Trousers
How to Acquire:
Found at the lower level of the Fortified Manor at Leyndell Royal Capital. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

name: Astrologer Trousers
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for   1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Bandit Boots
How to Acquire: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.        Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing.

name: Banished Knight Greaves
How to Acquire: Stormveil Castle: Chance for it to be looted off the Banished Knight enemies that you've killed.

name: Beast Champion Greaves
How to Acquire:
Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Knife Greaves
How to Acquire:
Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Blackflame Monk Greaves
How to Acquire: Drop from Blackflame Monks.

name: Bloodhound Knight Greaves
How to Acquire: Drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir.

name: Briar Greaves
How to Acquire: Purchased from the Enia in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle.

name: Bull-Goat Greaves
How to Acquire:
Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Champion Gaiters
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for  1,000 Runes.
 Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Carian Knight Greaves
How to Acquire:
You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy.
Elden Ring Map here        To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

name: Chain Leggings
How to Acquire:
Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kal√©. It costs  1000 Runes. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.        Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after giving them Kale's Bell Bearing

name: Cleanrot Greaves
How to Acquire: Dropped by Cleanrot Knight enemies. Found in places such as: Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs and Miquella's Haligtree        Can be found at Inner Aeonia

name: Cloth Trousers
How to Acquire:
Found at the chest located at the end of Murkwater Cave, alongside Cloth Garb. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Commoner's Shoes
How to Acquire: Can drop from Commoner enemies in Stormveil Castle.

name: Confessor Boots
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1000 Runes. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Consort's Trousers
How to Acquire:
Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  1,500 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here        Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the summoned Tannith's Knight near the Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy site of grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Crucible Greaves
Special Effect: 3.5% damage increase to Aspect of the Crucible Incantations
How to Acquire:
Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis at Auriza Hero's Grave. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link        Found with the Crucible Tree Set in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a mini-boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Eccentric's Breeches
How to Acquire:
This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya Lucaria Academy.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Elden Lord Greaves
How to Acquire: Available from Enia after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

name: Errant Sorcerer Boots
How to Acquire:
Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Exile Greaves
How to Acquire: Drop from Exile Soldiers.

name: Finger Maiden Shoes
How to Acquire:
Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run past NPC invader to touch Grace first. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Fire Monk Greaves
How to Acquire: Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Foot Soldier Greaves
How to Acquire: Dropped by Foot Soldier-type Soldier enemies. Defeat a Foot Soldier to gain a chance to obtain this item. Foot Soldiers can be found protecting the Purified Ruins.

name: Fur Leggings
How to Acquire: Drops from Ancestral Follower enemies.that can be found at Siofra River.

name: Gelmir Knight Greaves
How to Acquire:
You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse.
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Godrick Knight Greaves
How to Acquire: Gatefront Ruins: Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight patrolling the outpost.        Fort Haight: Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort walls.

name: Godskin Apostle Trousers
How to Acquire:
Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Guardian Greaves
How to Acquire: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.        An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.

name: Haligtree Greaves
How to Acquire: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Hoslow's Greaves
How to Acquire:
All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.        Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Kaiden Trousers
How to Acquire: Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found in Limgrave.

name: Knight Greaves
How to Acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for  3,000 Runes.

name: Land of Reeds Greaves
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class        Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000  Runes. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Leather Trousers
How to Acquire:
Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1500 Runes.
 Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

name: Lionel's Greaves
How to Acquire:
Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Malformed Dragon Greaves
How to Acquire:
Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Maliketh's Greaves
How to Acquire: Bought from the Enia in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

name: Millicent's Boots
How to Acquire: This piece is not currently obtainable.

name: Mushroom Legs
How to Acquire:
Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Noble's Trousers
How to Acquire:
Found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women.
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Omenkiller Boots
How to Acquire:
Dropped by an Omenkiller.
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Queen's Leggings
How to Acquire:
Queen's Leggings can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000 
Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

name: Page Trousers
How to Acquire: Leyndell Royal Capital: Dropped by Page enemies in Tombsward Ruins Underground.

name: Preceptor's Trousers
How to Acquire:
Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Prisoner Trousers
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.        Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for  1000 Runes.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Prophet Trousers
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.        Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for  1,000 Runes. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Radahn's Greaves
How to Acquire: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

name: Radahn Soldier Greaves
How to Acquire: Chance to drop from Radahn Soldiers, easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael.

name: Raging Wolf Greaves
How to Acquire:
Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Raya Lucarian Greaves
How to Acquire: Dropped by Raya Lucarian Soldiers        Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Caria Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

name: Rotten Duelist Greaves
Special Effect: Increases likelihood of being targeted by foes
How to Acquire:
The Rotten Duelist Greaves Leg Armor can be found by killing a Rotten Duelist that's facing the cliff edge located a little northwest of Ordina, Liturgical Town which is located in the northern part of the Consecrated Snowfields. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Sage Trousers
How to Acquire:
Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged corpse near the end, guarded by an Giant Bats that will attack you when you take it.
 Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Sanguine Noble Waistcloth
How to Acquire:
The entire Sanguine Noble Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in west Mountaintops of The Giants. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth.
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Scaled Greaves
How to Acquire:
Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Snow Witch Skirt
How to Acquire:
Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Sorcerer Leggings
How to Acquire: They are dropped by Raya Lucaria Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Traveler's Slops
How to Acquire:
Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's Set.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Traveling Maiden Boots
How to Acquire:
On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link        Possibly altered in a patch to weigh 0.2 less and have 0.1 more damage negation across all categories (confirmation required).

name: Twinned Greaves
How to Acquire:
Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter.
Elden Ring Map here        Obtained at end of D Hunter's questline.

name: Warrior Greaves
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class         Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria). 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Vagabond Knight Greaves
How to Acquire:
Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.        Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000  Runes. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Veteran's Greaves
How to Acquire: Can be bought from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Niall

name: White Reed Greaves
How to Acquire:
Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Armor and White Reed Gauntlets can also be found on this corpse. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Zamor Legwraps
How to Acquire:
Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: The entire Zamor Set is dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the end of this dungeon. 
Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Drake Knight Greaves
How to Acquire:
You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.
Elden Ring Map here        Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

name: Perfumer Sarong
How to Acquire: The Perfumer Sarong can be looted from perfumers found through Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Spellblade's Trousers
Special Effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%
How to Acquire: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

name: Ronin's Greaves
How to Acquire:
Acquired by following Yura's questline.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Blaidd's Greaves
How to Acquire:
Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).
Elden Ring Map here

name: Night's Cavalry Greaves
How to Acquire:
You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Blue Silver Mail Skirt
How to Acquire: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.        One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

name: Nomadic Merchant's Trousers
How to Acquire:
In the hidden tunnels behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room at the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital.        After opening the secret passage behind the altar and taking the stairs down, after crossing the narrow fallen rafter, directly to the left is a tent and in the far corner you can find Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau and the full Nomadic Merchant's Set.
Elden Ring Map here        To get access to the set, you need to aggro the enemy walking around close by and lead it next to the tent and have it use its frenzy attack to break the tent.

name: Tree Sentinel Greaves
How to Acquire:
The Tree Sentinel Set is obtained by solving a puzzle in Auriza Hero's Grave. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Royal Knight Greaves
How to Acquire: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Royal Knight Loreta for  4000.

name: Nox Greaves
How to Acquire: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

name: Shaman Leggings
How to Acquire: The leggings can be looted off of the Ancestral Follower Shaman in the Ancestral Woods area of Siofra River.

name: Duelist Greaves
How to Acquire: The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.        There is an apparent Colosseum on a hill in the southeast area of the city that has two Duelists, one patrolling the path and one at the top. Both of these enemies have a chance to drop all three pieces.

name: Fire Prelate Greaves
How to Acquire: Dropped by Fire Prelates.        One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.        One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Aristocrat Boots
How to Acquire: Dropped by Aristocrat Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Aristocrat enemies that wander the roads of most areas.        A group of three can be easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins near the Road to the Manor site of grace. Turning around from where Iji's workstation is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an illusory wall.        Another spot is the traveling carriage escort on the roads north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.

name: Old Aristocrat Shoes
How to Acquire: All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from other Aristocrats.        There are a number of Old Aristocrats within the caravan of enemies north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.        Altus Plateu - There are Old Aristocrats to the left of Gold Mask's Bridge.

name: Vulgar Militia Greaves
How to Acquire: Dropped by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies found around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

name: Godskin Noble Trousers
How to Acquire:
Dropped by Godskin Noble Bossfight. 
Elden Ring Map here.

name: Depraved Perfumer Trousers
How to Acquire: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.

name: Old Sorcerer's Legwraps
How to Acquire:
Old Sorcerer's Legwraps  can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The legwraps will be there, along with the rest of his set for the taking. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Ragged Loincloth
How to Acquire: Not currently obtainable.

name: War Surgeon Trousers
How to Acquire: Dropped by killing one of three nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area of Siofra River, northwest of the Palace Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled lake. This one can be found adjacent to the Giant Crow enemy near the blood filled lake drop off.

name: Royal Remains Greaves
Special Effect: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.
How to Acquire: Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after beating him.

name: Brave's Legwraps
How to Acquire: The Brave's Legwraps Leg Armor is currently unobtainable.

name: Malenia's Greaves
How to Acquire: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella.

name: Fingerprint Greaves
How to Acquire:
Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Omen Greaves
How to Acquire:
The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Battlemage Legwraps
How to Acquire: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.        The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge. Elden Ring Map Link.

name: Traveler's Boots
How to Acquire:
Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: The entire Traveler's Set is found deep underground in a side room with a large orange flower, adjacent to the Haligtree Roots site of grace. 
Elden Ring Map Link

name: Gold Waistwrap
How to Acquire:
Gold Waistwrap can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Capital of Ash site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of his set on his body.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Leather Boots
How to Acquire:
Murkwater Cave: Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy.
Elden Ring Map here

name: Godrick Soldier Greaves
How to Acquire: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldier patrolling the outpost

name: Leyndell Soldier Greaves
How to Acquire: This helm and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted as drops from the foot soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Mausoleum Greaves
How to Acquire: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.        An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

name: Cuckoo Knight Greaves
How to Acquire: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three nearby to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

name: Leyndell Knight Greaves
How to Acquire: Dropped by Gold Dragon Cult Knights.

name: Redmane Knight Greaves
How to Acquire:
Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael. 
Elden Ring Map here

name: Mausoleum Knight Greaves
How to Acquire: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces can be farmed from the Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.        Other possible locations include:         Near the Weeping Peninsula Walking Mausoleum.

name: Haligtree Knight Greaves
How to Acquire: Haligtree Knights drop the Haligtree Knight Armor, Haligtree Knight Gauntlets, and Haligtree Knight Greaves. They can be found in the latter areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Deathbed Smalls
How to Acquire: Deathbed Smalls are apparently CUT CONTENT and cannot be found in-game
